text.title: South African judge jails eight police for Mido Macia's 'barbaric' murder
text.head: South African judge jails eight police for Mido Macia's 'barbaric' murder
Sources

list.item: Zandi Shabalala. "Former South African police jailed for 'barbaric' dragging murder" — The Sydney Morning Herald , November 13, 2015
Sewell Chan. "South Africa Court Sentences 8 Ex-Policemen in Immigrant’s Murder" — The New York Times , November 11, 2015
Chrispin Mwakideu. "South African policemen sentenced for taxi driver murder" — Deutsche Welle , November 11, 2015
